      • updateScaleContext

        public boolean updateScaleContext(UserScaleContext ctx)
        Description copied from interface: ScaleContextAware
        Updates the current context with the state of the provided context. If ctx is null, then updates the current context via ScaleContext.update() and returns the result.
        Specified by:
        updateScaleContext in interface ScaleContextAware
        Parameters:
        ctx - the new scale context
        Returns:
        whether any of the scale factors has been updated
